name: All Goblin
description:
You are a goblin, an alien species recently brought to the brink of extinction. You must find your way out of the temple, turned prison, by any means necessary.
Find strange creatures, obscure and hidden secrets. Bring honor to your goblin ancestors

Explore the Temple Megastructure by opening shortcuts leading back to where you started, allowing for easy traversal through the building.

Unlock upgrades to make your journey easier.

Use your trusty automatic slingshot to stay safe from those that wish to catch you.

Make sure you are prepared for the final battle.


Other Features:
-Giant tower with a generator powering a single elevator
-Funny little names for each area
-Jumping puzzles
-Future updates to the game, it's an ever expanding creature

Many goblins were harmed in the making of this game, don't let their sacrifice be in vain.

Move: WASD
Run: Left Shift
Aim: Right Mouse Button
Pick up objects while aiming by pressing E
Fire With Left Mouse Button While Aiming
